tables.title: Ominous Signs
tables.description: Strange happenings that warn the group the veil is thin tonight.

entries.result: All photographs on a phone gain a shadowy figure in the background.
A church bell rings once at midnight despite the tower being empty.
Window frost forms runes that melt away when written down.
Dogs refuse to bark; instead they stare at the same corner of the room.
Candles burn with inverted flames that point toward an unseen presence.
A mirror fogs over and reveals a room that is not behind the glass.
Radio static repeats the party's last whispered sentence.
Footsteps circle the house though no tracks appear in the dust outside.
A family portrait has shifted expressions toward subtle dread.
A lone raven pecks a Morse warning before flying into the chimney.
